src_original: (KP-VD) Hoenrle 143 S.B. 38+39+Mannerheim Fragment No. 3  r8 bhavati / ācā .y. + + + + + + + aṇumātreṣv api 'vadyeṣu bhayadarśī samādāya śikṣati śikṣāpade .. .. .. .i .. ddh. .. .. .. .. .. .. + + +

v2 pravṛtavinayo vinayagupto + + + + y. dṛṣṭiṃ cāsyānucalitaṃ bhavati :  ayaṃ kāśyapa dvitīyo duḥśīlaḥ śīlavapratirūpakaḥ //  punar aparaṃ kāśyapa ihaikatyo bhikṣuḥ  (KP-VD) Hoenrle 143 S.B. 38+39+Mannerheim Fragment No. 3  v3 maitrāvihārī bhavati /  satvāraṃbaṇay. + + + + samanvāgato bhavati /
ajātiṃ sarvasaṃkārāṇāṃ śrutvā :  uttrasati saṃtrasati /  saṃtrāsam āpadyate /  ayaṃ kāśyapa tṛtīyo duḥśīlaḥ  (KP-VD) Hoenrle 143 S.B. 38+39+Mannerheim Fragment No. 3  v4 śīlavapratirūpakaḥ //
punar aparaṃ kāśyapa ihaikatyo bhikṣuḥ dvādaśa dhutaguṇān samādāya vartate /
